paper_abstract: Purpose - This paper aims to review current advances in the development of semantic e-business with particular reference to semantic web technologies. Secure e-business processes, and knowledge management aims to discuss future concerns and the challenges of e-business. Design/methodology/approach - A general review and survey of selected research and development topics. Findings - Illustrates the multi- and trans-disciplinary nature of cybernetics and systems with a view to further research and development activity. Practical implications - The choice of reviews provides an awareness of the current trends in these areas of endeavour. Originality/value - The reviews are selected from a global database and give a studied assessment of current research and development initiatives.
paper_title: Advances in the development of semantic e-business
